head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths PICOLI, DONNA SPARLING

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths PICOLI, DONNA SPARLING

block.p: PICOLI-Donna Sparling. Of Old Brookville, N.Y. On July 24, 2000. Beloved wife of Robert C. Mother of Eden Barnes, Megg Hoffman and Robert C. Jr. Sister of Barrie D. Sparling. Grandmother of six. Great-grandmother of one. Service private. In lieu of flowers, donations to Theodore Roosevelt Sanctuary, Inc, 134 Cove Road, Oyster Bay, N.Y. 11771.
